name: General Hi
description: General Hi is one of Azula's generals and controls an important fortress located at the border of the Fire Nation. She has command over a raiding force. She will never tire to disrupt an enemy's economy and will do everything to keep her fortress from falling into the enemy's clutches. Just like her Firelord, she will enjoy slowly burning everything her enemies treasure to the ground.
author: Kimberly Azula
